personal.name: Megha S.K
personal.summary:
Curious and motivated B.Tech IT student with a strong interest in software development and
 artificial intelligence. Skilled in programming with Java, Python, and web technologies, with a
 passion for solving real-world problems through innovative solutions. Eager to gain hands-on
 experience in AI, data science, and software engineering projects. Strong analytical mindset
 with quick learning ability, adaptability, and teamwork skills. Seeking an opportunity to apply
 my technical knowledge and grow as a technology professional.

projects.name: Cold email Generator
projects.description:
Developed an AI-powered cold email generator using LLaMA 3.3, LangChain, ChromaDB,
 and Streamlit to help software service companies automate and personalize B2B
 outreach. The tool extracts job requirements from postings, matches them with relevant
 internal project portfolios using vector search, and generates tailored emails highlighting
 key expertise

projects.name: Book store
projects.description:
Developed a full-stack Bookstore web application with interactive UI features for adding,
 editing, and updating products. Utilized Vue.js and React for the frontend, Node.js for the
 backend, and MongoDB as the database. Integrated RESTful APIs tested using Postman
 and deployed the application on Render for live access. The project showcases seamless
 user experience, responsive design, and effective CRUD operations.

projects.name: Fit Recommendation System
projects.description:
Developed an AI-powered Fit Recommendation System that estimates waist and hip
 measurements from user images using MediaPipe for pose estimation. Processed body
 landmarks to generate accurate measurements and map them to brand-specific sizing
 charts. Integrated computer vision and real-time AI inference for practical use in e
commerce and fashion.

projects.name: Speak Genie
projects.description: Developed a AI assistant for improvising children learning and understanding ability, implemented voice agents and various interactive mode (teacher, genie and friend) for better understanding

projects.name: Snake and Ladder
projects.description: Developed a coding based application to understand DSA concepts and web working in detail

projects.name: Solar prediction
projects.description: Created a AI/ML model to understand and predict the power output from solar cells using real time industrial data and the relevant locations weather data, did data cleaning, preprocessing, Analysis, model training , testing and ready for deployment
